title: 1.3 Master Challenge 3
question: In Double Caesar’s Cipher, two different keys are used to encrypt and decrypt the messages one after the other. Create a brute force function to break the Double Caesar’s Cipher using nested loops. You need to try all the 25 X 25 combinations of keys.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
